site.notes: Former hospital for people with tuberculosis, changed hands several times after being turned into a nursing home with the purpose of being a prison, apartments, and finally the world's largest statue of Jesus but money fell through; now operates as haunted attraction and history tours since 2001. Famously has a death tunnel.

tv_episodes.synopsis: TAPS investigates Waverly Hills Sanatorium in Louisville, Kentucky, a former tuberculosis hospital with reports of paranormal activity.
Jason and Grant reveal findings from their live Halloween investigation at Waverly Hills Sanatorium.
The team investigates Waverly Hills Sanatorium, described as one of North America's most haunted locations.
The crew investigates the dark history of Waverly Hills Sanatorium and the spirits said to remain there.
The team investigates Waverly Hills Sanatorium, labeled in listings as one of the most haunted hospitals in the U.S.
Nick and Katrina investigate Waverly Hills Sanatorium, trying to document the shadow figures reported in its corridors.

tv_episodes.episode_title: Ghost Hunters Return to Waverly Hills
tv_episodes.synopsis: The team returns to Waverly Hills Sanatorium after new owners report unsettling paranormal activity.
The team opens the season at Waverly Hills Sanatorium, a location they say they have feared for years.

youtube_videos.video_title: OVERNIGHT in HAUNTED WAVERLY HILLS: Evil Lives Forever (Full Series)
youtube_videos.description_text:
OVERNIGHT in HAUNTED WAVERLY HILLS: Full Series from TFIL in 2021!
For your chance to win $100,000 and support a great cause go to https://www.omaze.com/overnight

Staying overnight in the Haunted Waverly Hills Sanitorium has been on our list since day 1 of TFIL and we couldn't be more excited to finally be here for a full blown paranormal investigation.   The events in this series take place from 6PM - 7AM and include the many horror stories and hauntings of Waverly Hills.  Our night here ends due to experiencing paranormal activity like we never have before and could never imagine was possible.... #OVERNIGHT #PARANORMAL #HAUNTED
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can now TRAVEL WITH TFIL!  Week long trips all around the world that you can join!
https://www.TravelWithTFIL.com has all the info!  

Every trip is led by Elton Castee & the TFIL film/photography team.  Utah, Iceland, Peru, South Africa, New Zealand, Thailand & so much more!
